item.title: Daily Life
item.description: My takeaway from Physics Quantum Cryptography Explained by Professor Dirk Bouwmeester When Biology meets Physics Biophysics course lectured by Professor Cyrus R. Safinya Dr.B: 'Explosion is the key!' Electromagnetism My comrades in Physics: Rio Shiihara and Blake Haist Lab routine at 9pm Shanghai Tower, Jinmao Building, and Shanghai World Financial Center Summer internship at SWFC, Shanghai Photo by my best friend Sam Cai (summer 2017)!

item.title: Fun!!!
item.description: 'Never give up!!!' Dr.B's office Why Physics Optical Theory Is there a dinosaur on the blackboard? The world entirely changed after taking a short nap in class. Thermal Magician An Introduction to Thermal Physics by Daniel V. Schroeder My friends: Andy Wang and 'Captain Chung' are demonstrating topology to me, by circuits.

item.title: My Biology Career
item.description: Rothman Lab, MCDB Department Where I worked for 2 years! Me in summer 2018! C. elegans (nematodes) are raised here in sealed plates. Each plate is denoted with date and temperature preserved, and C. elegans' type. Synchronize C. elegans embryos. Design chemotaxis experiments and examine social behavior of C.

item.title: Physics Experiments (2019)
item.description: Electrons (blue laser) are balanced with gravitational force Photo by my lab teammate: Tairan Zhang Five hours a day, four days a week. No more Electronic circuits and bread board!! ‘Labmade’ cell phone amplifier Try Latex in the command window. Latex output International Space Station (ISS) catched by my teammate Yihong Xu's iphone camera!

item.title: Physics Experiments (2020)
item.description: The Cavendish Experiment Measured the gravitational constant by the torsional balance equipment (with my friend/teammate Rohit Penumarti)! Movement of pendulum is recorded by camera and fitted on Matlab It takes several hours to wait until the pendulum setting down: it seems damping accidently due to external force. We got perfect data of oscillation and fitted by fourier function on the last day.

item.title: Sports is Life
item.description: Fencing 'Champions' With Coach Tim Robinson and my teammate Jack Bennett! Basketball training Being assistant to Coach Gary Colson (Memphis Grizzlies)! Met with Brandon Ingram in his Rookie Year (2016-17). Kendo team practicing

item.title: Think as an Economist!
item.description: Professor Ted Bergstrom's office, UCSB The one who always helps and encourages me to explore in Economics
